for those people who can't get this working.

1. disconnect internet when installing.
2. If you've Kaspersky then after reboot > launch Kaspersky > settings > application filtering > right click on Nero folder's Network panel and select 'deny'
that'll prevent Nero's components  from connecting to home site and make it run.

Hi ppl - quick thing regarding Rollback error - I seem to recall a previous time i encountered this, I did a windows update and then it worked ok.  It may be to do with the Microsoft .NET Framework components.  Make sure the latest version of this is installed before installing Nero.

I'm usually pretty savvy at stuff like this and never had to ask for help.

Well this one's got me stumped.

Like others here, all I get is the Russian installation setup.

I've tried waiting 30mins for the 'English version' to popup after running the executable.

Nada.

Nothing installs except for uninstall.exe. No 'rollback' errors.

I'm on a very clean WinXP SP3.

And I'd normally chuck this into the junk downloads list but I get the vibe that Murlok's a legit guy who shares good torrents.

Hrmm, should I go for the 'Ultimate (bloatware) version' or wait to see if somebody comes up with something to make this leaner version work?
